entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
